1003.zh_cn_introduction: Katrina (MAIN) opened up a bar in Bavaria in hopes to make a decent living after her family's business was destroyed in WWI. Little did she know that her business would be once again disrupted by war. Jacko (MAIN), a undercover American agent, and Drago (SUPPORTING), a SS captain, meet over whiskey only to butt heads and bring WWII right to her front doorstep.

1008.zh_cn_introduction: Edward (MAIN) is a highly religious farm boy from Idaho. He knows he must serve his country and volunteers to be a marine.  Sergeant Jones (SUPPORTING), thinks he is crazy and trie to break his will, but fails. Instead he makes him a battlefield medic. Edward befriends Carl, another brave medic and together they save countless lives.

1009.zh_cn_introduction: Butch (MAIN), an old Vietnam veteran, feels wronged by society. His old commander, Willis (MAIN) contacts him and thells him there is a new mission brewing. They are putting together a team of the toughest soldiers in the world. Captain Morse (Supporting) explains that they need to kill a general named Matteo (VILLAIN). Dropped in the jungle, they encounter a lone warrior who has been fighting Matteo for years. Mark (MAIN) helps them survive in these tough conditions and together they take the enmey down.

1021.zh_cn_introduction: Nick (MAIN) is an international arms smuggler. With the help of his lovely assistant Jenna (MAIN), he is making millions of dollars selling weapons of death to guerilla warriors. He befriends a young revolutionary named Attiba (SUPPORTING) who shows him the dark side of war. Together with Russian soldier Boris (SUPPORTING) and Ginger (SUPPORTING), they decide to try to work towards good instead.

1025.zh_cn_introduction: Otto (MAIN) is a German factory owner in Nazi Germany. He decides to take action and to help the only way he can by hiring Jewish workers for his factory and protecting them this way.  Otto's factory is moved to Poland where the SS commander in charge of the camp, Heinrich (VILLAIN), does anything to torture his prisoners. Along with his trusted associate Schlomo (MAIN), they formulate a plan to save as many Jewish lives as possible.

1028.zh_cn_introduction: Shortly after D-Day, a mother gets news that 4 of her sons have died during the war. In order to protect this mother from losing all her sons, the US government decide to save the last one alive, Private Ryan (MAIN). The mission is given to Corporal Bunks (Main) to find and extract Private Ryan. Along with his squad, consisting of Private Josephs (SUPPORTING), Private Smiggs (Supporting) and Private Tenucci (SUPPORTING).

1033.zh_cn_introduction: Kenneth, a lone British soldier (MAIN), tries to survive on the beaches of Dunkirk as the Germans press forward. On the other side of the English channel, a father and son duo, William (SUPPORTING) and Edward (SUPPORTING), prepare their boat and cross the channel together to help rescue the entire British army.

1034.zh_cn_introduction: Timothy (MAIN), a young farm boy, is sent to the battlelines of WW1. His pal, Dunfy (MAIN) fights by his side and together they live through hell. At the darkest moment, Timothy finds a valliant horse that he begins to ride on through the battle stations. Seargeant Haynes, his commander, is

1041.zh_cn_introduction: In the midst of the civil war, Kellyann (MAIN) finds herself running for her life to escape the violence. With her lover, Grant (main), she escapes danger after danger and works to better her life.

1045.zh_cn_introduction: Two Croatian double agents, Maggie (MAIN) and Boris (VILLAIN) have infiltrated MI6, to take down the UK government. A wrench is thrown into the plan when Elias (SUPPORTING), Maggie's brother, is killed by the Croatian government and unfurls a winding action tale of her revenge. MI6 agent, Rufus (SUPPORTING), scuked into the mess is stuck trying to find the truth.
